body: Hi All! I'm testing out the use of the Thermal Autonomy component, however the prerequisite Microclimate Map Analysis component is not giving out any data. I've gone over my component inputs and am confused as to where I am going wrong. Any help would be appreciated. Please note that I have changed the coding to take 8.2 instead of 8.3 as our uni computers only have 8.2 for the moment PS. excuse my file, I am also playing with the parametric iterations for running several simulations at once. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/fjCJhks0XLueaItAZXPvOwswzT2PCjoPf01uutf*cDbvbfjzgDPegJpzpU6jVblzvFmkhkoH8-C*9bpAmb8seYxauXEWDATp/AdaptiveComfortIssue.JPG)
topic: Error: Microclimate Map Analysis Component not producing data
